contentrichtext.text: '''Chama''' may refer to: ==Places== *[[Chama, Colorado]], USA, an unincorporated town *[[Chama, New Mexico]], USA, a village *[[Chama, Zambia]], a small town and district *[[Chama River (Venezuela)]], aka ''RÃ­o Chama'', a river in Venezuela *[[Rio Chama (Rio Grande)]], a tributary of the Rio Grande *[[Chama (Maya site)]], an archaeological site in the Alta Verapaz, Guatemala ==Other== *[[Chama (genus)|''Chama'' (genus)]], a genus of bivalve molluscs *[[Japanese_honorifics#Baby_talk_variations|-chama]], a [[Japanese honorifics|Japanese honorific]] *''Chama'', a variant name of [[Kamadeva]], the Hindu god of love *((chama, East Africa Kenya)) A Swahili word meaning a group or organization for fund raising i.e. Merry-go-round fund raising group {{disambig}}
